The treatment always start low-sodium diet ( nutritionist whenever possible ) , increase fruit vegetable intake , weight loss , aerobic exercise , stop smoking , change lifestyle . In patient without associate pathology , pharmacological first step use Enalapril ( ARA II cough ) , second step use calcium channel blocker , third step use diuretic like Hydrochlorothiazide 12.5mg ( 25mg ) . If orthostatic hypotension , consider start Amlodipine . In patient tachyarrhythmia , heart failure coronary disease use Metoprolol Carvedilol .
